about_the_game:
Go on a journey through countless dimensions shaped by bullets and sound.

Take Control of an Aether Fly
Control an "Aether Fly", an inter-dimensional space insect, as you make your way through the aether stream.
Dodge and survive the hazards of your current environment as you generate a portal that will allow you to slip into the next world.

The Sound of the World
An Aether Fly can sense the sound of the world, giving it (and you) an indication of the dangers that linger in the environment,
meaning everything around you will be in sync to the music of the world.

The Shape of the World
Each world you visit has it's own set of wonders (and dangers).
Dodge bullets that come from the environment, as well as other inter-dimensional creatures that inhabit the world.

The Flow of the World
Ever changing and ever moving forward, each world will present a different experience.

Metamorphosis
As time passes, much like the aether fly, you may find this game take on many different forms. Transforming not only how you play Aether Fly, but also your understanding of what an "Aether Fly" is.

As "Indie" as Indie Gets
Aether Fly is crafted and published by a single person without
AI assistance or any funding from external sources outside the Aether Fly community,
ensuring that the authenticity and freedom of the games growth will be lead solely by the vision of it's creator
and the feedback of it's community.

This is just the beginning, stay tuned.
